query:
SELECT au.id, au.campaignId, au.username, au.name, au.isOwner, au.needsPasswordChange, au.active, c.slug
FROM admin_users au
INNER JOIN campaigns c ON au.campaignId = c.id
WHERE c.slug = 'rafael';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4BVDFYYBjXPHJtC.709074b71e30 --database EvJULGQoHRNqTu98ru5T2m --execute
